data.description_suggestion: Creates a new Lexeme or replaces an existing one within the specified Language. Requires authentication. The request body must contain the complete Lexeme data. data.current_summary: Perform a partial update on a Language
data.current_description: Performs a partial update the Language whose ID is specified in the URL. If the Language object has an `id` property, is ignored in favor of the ID in the URL.
